Method Detail

doBeforeQuery

boolean doBeforeQuery(ComboBox comboBox,
                      ComboBoxCallback cb)
Fires before all queries are processed. Return false to cancel the query.

Parameters:
comboBox - this
cb - callback
Returns:
false to cancel the query

doBeforeSelect

boolean doBeforeSelect(ComboBox comboBox,
                       Record record,
                       int index)
Fires before a list item is selected. Return false to cancel the selection.

Parameters:
comboBox - this
record - the data record returned from the underlying store
index - the data record returned from the underlying store
Returns:
false to cancel
